actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to extend the life of the Commission on Civil Rights.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to provide that members of the Civil Rights Commission be appointed for a term of six years. Authorizes the President to remove a member only for neglect of duty or malfeasance in office. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to extend the life of the Commission on Civil Rights.
